function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible inclusion of biased studies in the search results.","Impact":"Inaccurate or misleading conclusions drawn from the literature review.","Mitigation":"Use rigorous inclusion and exclusion criteria, and ensure independent review of search results.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, authors, and reviewers.","Owner":"Research teams, systematic review coordinators."},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of study outcomes due to varying levels of evidence.","Impact":"Misleading or incorrect conclusions drawn from the evidence.","Mitigation":"Apply the GRADE tool consistently and transparently to assess the level of evidence for each study.","Technologies":"GRADEpro Guideline Development Tool.","People":"Researchers, authors, and reviewers.","Owner":"Research teams, systematic review coordinators."},{"Description":"Failure to address potential conflicts and bias during study selection and evaluation.","Impact":"Introduction of biased or incomplete information into the review, leading to erroneous conclusions.","Mitigation":"Establish clear conflict of interest policies, use independent reviewers, and transparently report potential biases.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team members, reviewers, and authors.","Owner":"Research teams, systematic review coordinators."}]}
